statements.statement: I would prefer to walk to do my daily activities
For me, it is very important to have my own patio or garden
I would prefer to live on a rather populated neighborhood
It is very important to have wide paths in good condition within my neighborhood
I would prefer to live in a neighborhood with some businesses and services, but not too many.
I would like to live in a gated community condo with different houses and my own green space.
It is very important to have parks near my house
I prefer a neighborhood with "cul de sacs" and few intersections
I would like to live in a building with more than six floors
I would like to get out of my house and be able to find a taxi easily
It would be essential to have a garage on my property
I would like to live in a townhouse neighborhood without front seatback
I would prefer to live in of main roads and/or avenues
I would prefer to use public transport to get to my work or place of study
I would like to live in the countryside
I would like many businesses, services and equipment near my house
I would like to move around on a motorcycle
I would prefer to live in an apartment rather than in a house
I would prefer a neighborhood with ample paved streets for easy access with vehicles and motorcycles
It would be very important to have parking space on the front of my house
I would prefer to live in a detached house
I would be interested in living in a place near the historic center
I'd like to use a bicycle as my main transport mode
I'd prefer living in a residential neighborhood without the noise and fuss of shops and amenities
I'd like to live in a nice neighborhood, with a mix of houses, apartment buildings and amenities
I would prefer to move by taxi for my daily activities
I would like to have more cycleways in my neighborhood
I would like to live in a gated community condo with uniform, terraced houses
I would like an attached house with a small front garden or seatback
I would prefer to use my own car to move daily
I would love to have several bus lines in my neighborhood
I would be interested that all the roads in my neighborhood are well connected
I would prefer to live in a low populated area
I would like to live in an historical building
I would avoid to live in a street that is too wide
When I travel by car, I prefer to be the companion rather than the driver
